label: SpecifiedChemicalTreatment
comment: Any substance such as dyestuffs, chrome oxide, acids, sulphate, surfactant or other chemicals applied to an agricultural field, substrate, plant, animal product, material or product.

datatypeProperties.comment: A code specifying a type of MDH health indication.

objectProperties.comment: A prominent attribute or aspect of an object, such as recyclability of a product, which can meet customer needs without compromising the ability of future generations to meet their own needs.
A piece of written, printed or electronic matter that provides information or evidence that a process has met required criteria.
Any clearly defined substance having a defined molecular composition.

referencedBy.comment: A chemical treatment applied during this production process.
